review.reviewBody: one of my favorite go to foods
7. Chicken Fajita wasnt very flavourful.   everything else was good.
Been going here for almost two years now, these guys are legends, do not fade, everything on menu is +++++.
The personal butter chicken meal and the butter chicken pizza are both delicious good quality very consistent would recommend
Not consistent with flavour or quantity of chicken. Sometimes it is amazing and have lots and sometimes it doesn't taste good and had barely enough like  today. It was quite disappointing.
